entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Yeah, we knew Trump would try to cover up his bullshit handling of the Coronavirus pandemic.  LIES, LIES, LIES, LIES, LIES.  Defensive much, Trump?  You won't get re-elected in the fall.  Pack your bags.
